summary: SummaryDyson's Supersonic r Hair Dryer is their most powerful, yet lightest¹ hair dryer. Precision drying for a smoother finish. More shine.² No heat damage.
details: DetailsBenefits30% smaller, 20% lighter. Fastest drying¹Smoother hair, reduced frizz, and more shine²Intelligent attachments come with temperature and airflow preset by experts for optimal performance and remember your go-to styling preferencesFeaturesStreamlined flow heater engineered to heat airflow more evenly, for fast, precise drying¹Hair dryer technology engineered in revolutionary curve design. Dry and style where it's normally hard to reach with control and comfortRFID chips within the intelligent attachments communicate with your hair dryer to remember your settingsIntelligent heat control: Measures airflow temperature over 20 times a second, intelligently controlling the heating element to prevent heat damageNegative ions: Charged particles in the airflow help reduce static in the hairThree precise airflow settings: High for fast drying and styling, Medium for regular drying, Low for gentle drying and diffusingTemperature control - Four precise heat settings, including constant coolInstant control with cold shot to set your hair after styling¹vs. Dyson Supersonic™ hair dryer. Based on body weight²vs. air-dried hair³for use on dry and straight[ened] hairIncludesSupersonic r™ hair dryerPowerful air attachment produces high-velocity airflow to dry hair fastPro concentrator focuses air precisely where you need itDiffuser helps reduce frizz² and define curls, coils and wavesWide-tooth comb engineered to detangle and lengthen hair as it driesFlyaway attachment attracts longer hairs and hides flyaways on finished styles, using the Coanda effect³Item 2638792How To Use• Start with clean, wet hair.• For a smooth look, use the Powerful air attachment to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Pro concentrator with a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.• Enhance your natural curl pattern using the Diffuser or use the Wide-tooth comb attachment to stretch natural curls and coils.• To customize your attachment settings, change heat and airflow settings while in-use. Your Supersonic r™ will remember your preferred settings.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: • Start with clean, wet hair.• For a smooth look, use the Powerful air attachment to rough dry roots before styling. Section hair and use the Pro concentrator with a round brush to style one section at a time. Once hair is dry, use Flyaway attachment to create a smooth, shiny finish.• Enhance your natural curl pattern using the Diffuser or use the Wide-tooth comb attachment to stretch natural curls and coils.• To customize your attachment settings, change heat and airflow settings while in-use. Your Supersonic r™ will remember your preferred settings.

reviews.headline: Even better than the original Supersonic!
reviews.comments: I had the old Supersonic and I loved that but this is next level.  My drying time is even less with the R.   I also love how lightweight it is.

reviews.headline: Absolutely Love It
reviews.comments: This is my third Dyson Dryer. I loved both of the past models, but they were heavy & cumbersome to use. This new one is so light & the shape is perfect to hold. The cord with all models is thick & stiff, the only negative there is. I loved this new one

reviews.headline: Noticeable lighter weight
reviews.comments: This hair dryer is lighter in weight than my other expensive Dyson hair dryer. As others have said, the cool shot button on this hair dryer is in a weird place - I always have to fumble around to find it while drying my hair - the button seems higher than I would naturally expect it to be. Because this hair dryer is SO expensive, I hope it lasts a LONG time. My other Dyson hair dryer would over heat and shut off - other than that, it was fine. I routinely cleaned the filter area on my previous Dyson hair dryer, but I believe] the filter area was the problem with the hair dryer over heating. Hopefully, this version of the Dyson hair dryer is a better design - time will tell.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: When I got a haircut at Ulta the stylist used this Dyson and I was so impressed with how well it did. I previously owned the pink Dyson dryer (not the nural version) but my hair is fine and a bit dry with color treated ends so those supersonic powerful/forceful hair driers just make my hair too frizzy and hard to manage so I sold that one and wrote Dysons off as just to powerful for fine hair. But after the experience in the salon I thought maybe this one is the happy medium that works well. I also have a wrist injury to consider because I'm having a hard time rotating my wrist without pain and losing grip strength at certain angles. This dryer is so light and ergonomic it doesn't exacerbate the injury. It dries fast but gently enough to not make my hair frizzy. It looks great every time and dont feel like its wrecking my hair with heat damage. The attachments are really helpful and the button placements are not intrusive or easy to push while using it. The only thing I dont love is how pricy this version is. I got it when Ulta had 20% off and even that's a hard price to justify. But alas, I love it and would purchase it again.

reviews.headline: Lightest Dyson Hair Tool
reviews.comments: I really like this update Dyson Dryer. It's so light compared to the original. Similar attachments to the original. the new design and light weight of it makes drying hair easy and your arms don't get tired. it's lighter than the air wrap too!!! I love my OG Dryer and I hope to love this new one just as much. Used once so far and great results. I love the option to use no heat as well as the three different heat options and speed options.

reviews.headline: I do love it.
reviews.comments: It is very light. Pretty quiet . Works so very well. It is so expensive that I was a little on edge to buy it , but I liked my original Dyson Hair Dryer so well, that I thought I will try it. I loved it when I opened the box and loved it after about 6 uses now. I do wish it would have come with the one extra attachmenet that I have seen  , but I am very happy with this purchase. No disappointment at all. It is always so nice to get something that is just as perfect as you hoped it would be. No complaints. I am so glad I purchased it.

reviews.headline: Garbage
reviews.comments: First one stopped working after 1 use.  Red and white blinking lights.  Sent it to Dyson for a replacement.  Second one stopped working after a couple of weeks.  Same issue.  Dyson customer service was tedious and the for the second replacement, the shipping label they sent was wrong.  I give up.

reviews.headline: Amazing hair dryer
reviews.comments: Great product and would buy it again.

reviews.headline: Does what it says it does
reviews.comments: I have extremely thick, wavy hair and it usually takes 45 minutes to dry. This has significantly decreased the time to dry my hair plus it already feels healthier and bouncier. I would definitely buy this again!

reviews.headline: I would buy this hair dryer again
reviews.comments: With this hair dryer I have been able to get great results for my blowouts. My stylist even commented my hair looked better than ever. My hair dries faster and at a lower temperature. I love the attachment for getting rid of fly a ways.

reviews.headline: Crazy fast
reviews.comments:
Crazy. Crazy fast!! 

For reference: I have super thick, coarse, "thirsty" hair. When I just let it air dry, as always, I wrap it in a microfiber towel and leave it up till I do my makeup. Then I take it down and put in my leave ins, root booster, and my Kenra Air Dry Créme. My hair is still damp underneath for another 6-7 hours. 

Today, I took my towel off and put my regular stuff in my hair, adding Kenra Blow Dry Spray - which I always use when drying my hair. When I tell you my roots were dry in UNDER 5 minutes I am not exaggerating. It was nearly unbelievable! It usuallly takes 20 - 25 minutes to dry my hair. And my hair is super soft and silky.

I previously owned the pink Dyson dryer (not the nural version) but my hair is fine and a bit dry with color treated ends so those supersonic powerful/forceful hair driers just make my hair too frizzy and hard to manage so I sold that one and wrote Dysons off as just to powerful for fine hair. But after the experience in the salon I thought maybe this one is the happy medium that works well. I also have a wrist injury to consider because I'm having a hard time rotating my wrist without pain and losing grip strength at certain angles. This dryer is so light and ergonomic it doesn't exacerbate the injury. It dries fast but gently enough to not make my hair frizzy. It looks great every time and dont feel like its wrecking my hair with heat damage. The attachments are really helpful and the button placements are not intrusive or easy to push while using it. The only thing I dont love is how pricy this version is. I got it when Ulta had 20% off and even that's a hard price to justify. But alas, I love it and would purchase it again.
faceoff_positive.headline: Love it

faceoff_negative.comments: First one stopped working after 1 use.  Red and white blinking lights.  Sent it to Dyson for a replacement.  Second one stopped working after a couple of weeks.  Same issue.  Dyson customer service was tedious and the for the second replacement, the shipping label they sent was wrong.  I give up.
